inclusion.criterion: followed-up and treated in the Department of Pediatric Surgery at Trakya University due to epidididymo-orchitis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Testicular pathology other than epididymo-orchitis (undescended testis, testicular torsion)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Scrotal surgery (due to epididymoorchitis or not)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male with undescended testis, diagnosed via diagnostic laparoscopy.
